languages.text: "Таким он привиделся тебе, Домин'{name}? Ты видел{mf||а} в нем образ Смерти, но то был лишь образ. Благословенный дурман воскурился и освятил наш ритуал, но ты видел{mf||а} и убил{mf||а} лишь человека. Неумирающий не приходит к живым. Мы приходим к Нему".

traits.locale_text: "Хм?" {n}Ваши слова вырывают Кибеллу из собственных мыслей.{/n} "Вот, значит, как ты его видел{mf||а}, Эним'{name}? Ты видел{mf||а} Смерть, потому что для тебя Висирь был ее воплощением. Самым верным из слуг Его. Его герольдом. Но то был лишь образ, насланный дурманом — не более. Неумирающий не приходит к живым. Мы приходим к Нему".

languages.text: "Was that how you saw the Vizsier, Domin'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant blessed our ritual, but what you saw, and killed, was a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."
languages.original_text: "Таким он привиделся тебе, Домин'{name}? Ты видел{mf||а} в нем образ Смерти, но то был лишь образ. Благословенный дурман воскурился и освятил наш ритуал, но ты видел{mf||а} и убил{mf||а} лишь человека. Неумирающий не приходит к живым. Мы приходим к Нему".

traits.locale_text: "Was that how you saw him, Enim'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant had blessed our ritual, but you saw, and you killed, a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."

"Was that how you saw him, Enim'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant had blessed our ritual, but you saw, and you killed, a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."

"Was that how you saw the Vizsier, Domin'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant blessed our ritual, but what you saw, and killed, was a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."

"Was that how you saw the Vizsier, Domin'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant blessed our ritual, but what you saw, and killed, was a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."

"Was that how you saw the Vizsier, Domin'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant blessed our ritual, but what you saw, and killed, was a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."

"Was that how you saw the Vizsier, Domin'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant blessed our ritual, but what you saw, and killed, was a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."

languages.text: « Est-ce ainsi que le vizir vous a apparu, Domin'{name} ? Vous avez peut-être vu en lui une image de la mort, mais il ne s'agissait bien que d'une vision. Si les volutes des substances intoxicantes sacrées ont béni notre rituel, celui que vous avez vu, et abattu, n'était qu'un simple mortel. L'Immortel ne vient pas aux vivants. C'est nous qui nous présentons à Lui. »
languages.original_text: "Was that how you saw the Vizsier, Domin'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant blessed our ritual, but what you saw, and killed, was a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."

traits.locale_text: « Est-ce ainsi que le vizir vous a apparu, Domin'{name} ? Vous avez peut-être vu en lui une image de la mort, mais il ne s'agissait bien que d'une vision. Si les volutes des substances intoxicantes sacrées ont béni notre rituel, celui que vous avez vu, et abattu, n'était qu'un simple mortel. L'Immortel ne vient pas aux vivants. C'est nous qui nous présentons à Lui. »

languages.text: «¿Así veía al Visir, Domin'{name}? Vio una imagen de la Muerte en él, pero no era más que eso, una imagen. Los vapores del veneno sagrado bendijeron nuestro ritual pero lo que usted vio y mató era un hombre normal y corriente. El Inmortal no se acerca a los vivos. Nosotros nos acercamos a él».
languages.original_text: "Was that how you saw the Vizsier, Domin'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant blessed our ritual, but what you saw, and killed, was a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."

traits.locale_text: «¿Así veía al Visir, Domin'{name}? Vio una imagen de la Muerte en él, pero no era más que eso, una imagen. Los vapores del veneno sagrado bendijeron nuestro ritual pero lo que usted vio y mató era un hombre normal y corriente. El Inmortal no se acerca a los vivos. Nosotros nos acercamos a él».

languages.text: 「ヴィジールがそのように見えましたか、ドミン・{name}？彼の中に死の姿を見たとしても、それは単なるイメージです。神聖な興奮剤の煙で儀式は祝福されていますが、あなたが見た者、手にかけた者はただの人間。不死の者は生者のもとに現れません。我々があの方の元に行くのです」
languages.original_text: "Was that how you saw the Vizsier, Domin'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant blessed our ritual, but what you saw, and killed, was a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴィジールがそのように見えましたか、ドミン・{name}？彼の中に死の姿を見たとしても、それは単なるイメージです。神聖な興奮剤の煙で儀式は祝福されていますが、あなたが見た者、手にかけた者はただの人間。不死の者は生者のもとに現れません。我々があの方の元に行くのです」

languages.text: “莫非那就是宿老在你眼中的形象吗，秘者{name}？你在他身上看到了不死之神的形象，但那仅仅是个形象而已。神圣麻醉剂的烟雾为我们的仪式带来了祝福，然而你所看到的、杀死的，都仅仅是个凡人而已。不死之神是不会来到凡间的，从来都只有我们回到祂身边。”
languages.original_text: "Was that how you saw the Vizsier, Domin'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant blessed our ritual, but what you saw, and killed, was a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."

traits.locale_text: “莫非那就是宿老在你眼中的形象吗，秘者{name}？你在他身上看到了不死之神的形象，但那仅仅是个形象而已。神圣麻醉剂的烟雾为我们的仪式带来了祝福，然而你所看到的、杀死的，都仅仅是个凡人而已。不死之神是不会来到凡间的，从来都只有我们回到祂身边。”

languages.text: "Habt Ihr den Wesir so gesehen, Domin'{name}? Ihr habt ein Bildnis des Todes in ihm gesehen, doch es war nur ein Bildnis. Dämpfe des heiligen Rauschmittels haben unser Ritual gesegnet, doch was Ihr gesehen und getötet habt, war nur ein einfacher Mann. Der Todlose kommt nicht zu den Lebenden. Wir kommen zu Ihm."
languages.original_text: "Was that how you saw the Vizsier, Domin'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant blessed our ritual, but what you saw, and killed, was a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr den Wesir so gesehen, Domin'{name}? Ihr habt ein Bildnis des Todes in ihm gesehen, doch es war nur ein Bildnis. Dämpfe des heiligen Rauschmittels haben unser Ritual gesegnet, doch was Ihr gesehen und getötet habt, war nur ein einfacher Mann. Der Todlose kommt nicht zu den Lebenden. Wir kommen zu Ihm."

languages.text: "Vezir sana öyle mi göründü Domin'{name}? Onda Ölüm'ün suretini gördün ama gördüğün, suretten ibaretti. Kutsal uyarıcı maddelerin dumanları, ayinimizi kutsadı. Fakat senin görüp öldürdüğün şey, yalnızca bir insandı. Ölmeyen, fânilerin ayağına gelmez. Biz O'na gideriz."
languages.original_text: "Was that how you saw the Vizsier, Domin'{name}? You saw an image of Death in him, but it was only an image. Fumes of the sacred intoxicant blessed our ritual, but what you saw, and killed, was a mere man. The Undying One does not come to the living. We come to Him."
